metro.GameScreen

Class GameScreen.InGameMenuWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.GameScreen.GameScreen.InGameMenuWindow
  • Enclosing class:
    GameScreen

    public class GameScreen.InGameMenuWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the menu that'll appear after pressing ESC during the game. It provides exit options and a settings button. This window will ask the user if he wants to quit and the user can choose between "yes" and "no". There's also a "settings" button that will open the settings window.
    Author:
    hauke

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameScreen.InGameMenuWindow()
      Creates a new exit game window with a settings button.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void addButtonObserver()
      Creates observer for all buttons ("yes", "no" and "settings").
      private void close()
      Just closes the window and sets the _inGameMenuWindow to null.
